text: Azaria Alon (November 15, 1918 - January 19, 2014) was an Israeli environmentalist. He was the co-founder of the Society for the Protection of Nature in Israel (SPNI). Alon received an Israel Prize for lifetime achievement in 2012. He had previously been cited for the Israel Prize when the SPNI won it in 1980. Alon died on January 19, 2014 from natural causes, aged 95. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Israeli activists Category:Israeli Jews Category:Jewish activists Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Soviet Jews Category:Ukrainian Jews
title: Azaria Alon
